manual_input_prompts.ai_hint: If Black/Colored -> High probability of Chemical Burn, NOT Disease.

manual_input_prompts.question_bn: মাটিতে বা পানিতে কি বাজে গন্ধ আছে?
manual_input_prompts.ai_hint: If Sulfur smell -> Root Rot due to Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S).

crop_advice.irrigation_warning: DANGER: Do not use water from Dhaleshwari, Bangshi, or Turag rivers. Contains raw chemical effluent.

industrial_hotspots.name: Savar Tannery Industrial Estate (Hemayetpur)
industrial_hotspots.impact: Severe Soil Toxicity. Causes leaf scorching, root death, and stunted growth.

industrial_hotspots.name: Aminbazar Brick Kiln Cluster (Turag Bank)
industrial_hotspots.impact: SO2 Gas Injury. Leaves turn white (bleached) between veins.

industrial_hotspots.name: DEPZ Industrial Area (Ganakbari)
industrial_hotspots.impact: Chemical burn on crops if wastewater is used. Leaves may turn purple/red.

industrial_hotspots.name: Ulail Dyeing Cluster (Karnapara)
industrial_hotspots.impact: Thermal pollution cooks roots. High pH causes nutrient lockout (Yellowing).

industrial_hotspots.name: Ashulia Washing Plant Zone
industrial_hotspots.impact: Soil becomes alkaline. Leaves show signs of Iron deficiency (Interveinal chlorosis).

industrial_hotspots.name: Nayarhat Paper Mill Area
industrial_hotspots.impact: Mercury toxicity. Leaves deform and curl.

industrial_hotspots.name: Birulia Ceramic Industries
industrial_hotspots.impact: Physical blockage of stomata (Dust coating). Reduced photosynthesis.

industrial_hotspots.name: Fulbaria Chemical Factories
industrial_hotspots.impact: Volatile chemicals cause necrotic spots (dead tissue) on leaves.

manual_input_prompts.question_bn: পাতার ওপর কি কোনো ধুলোর আস্তরণ আছে?
manual_input_prompts.ai_hint: If Dust -> Diagnose as 'Stomata Blockage' (Abiotic), suggest washing with water.

manual_input_prompts.question_bn: জমি কি গত সপ্তাহে পাহাড়ি ঢলে ডুবেছিল?
manual_input_prompts.ai_hint: If Sand -> Soil texture altered, suggest organic manure.

crop_advice.irrigation_warning: Hill streams are safe but acidic. Haor water may carry high sediment.

industrial_hotspots.name: Jaflong Stone Crushing Zone
industrial_hotspots.impact: Thick grey dust layer blocks stomata. Plants suffocate and die.

industrial_hotspots.name: Bholaganj White Stone Quarry
industrial_hotspots.impact: Dust accumulation reduces growth. Leaves look grey/white.

industrial_hotspots.name: Chhatak Cement Factory
industrial_hotspots.impact: Alkaline burns. Cement dust reacts with dew/rain to burn leaf tissue.

industrial_hotspots.name: Fenchuganj Fertilizer Factory (NGFF)
industrial_hotspots.impact: Ammonia Burn. Leaf tips turn black or dark brown rapidly.

industrial_hotspots.name: Bibiyana Gas Field Area
industrial_hotspots.impact: Heat stress and localized hydrocarbon contamination.

industrial_hotspots.name: Sreemangal Tea Processing Cluster
industrial_hotspots.impact: Soot covers nearby vegetable crops, reducing quality.

industrial_hotspots.name: Shahjibazar Power Plant Zone
industrial_hotspots.impact: Nitrogen Oxide damage. Leaves show necrotic spots.

industrial_hotspots.name: Sylhet Pulp and Paper Mill (Chhatak)
industrial_hotspots.impact: Chlorine toxicity causes leaf curling and bleaching.

soil_profile.texture: Silty Loam to Silty Clay Loam (পলি দোআঁশ)

manual_input_prompts.ai_hint: If Knee deep -> Check for Stem Rot. If Dry -> Check for Blast.

manual_input_prompts.question_bn: জমির ১ কি.মি. এর মধ্যে কি ইটের ভাটা আছে?

crop_advice.irrigation_warning: Groundwater arsenic levels may be elevated in some pockets.

industrial_hotspots.name: Gumti River Brick Kiln Cluster
industrial_hotspots.impact: Leaf tip burn due to sulfur smoke.
